This is our report on making quizzes in LiaScript in 100 seconds.

{{< youtube 9kIdg-9rmHg >}}

Do you know an easier way of creating quizzes with your favorite LMS?

- Multiple-Choice
- Single-Choice
- Matrix
- Text-Input
- Selection
- Gap-Text

You can use this this example as a basis for your own course by following this
[link](https://liascript.github.io/LiveEditor/?)

... Or experiment with it in the LiveEditor below:
